english.segment1: Verse: Dear money, i wrote a song for you. cause you lead me to believe you buy me everything i need then you, fill me full of emptiness.
english.segment2: So money, it's time to call you out. about the way you say you pay and then you turn and walk away turns out, you can't keep your promises
english.segment3: Chorus: I'm changing the locks of my pockets now, cause if i don't let you in then you can't run out. well i love to hate to love you, but i cant get enough of you, i cant get enough, so I've had enough of you
english.segment4: Verse: Hey money I've had enough you
english.segment5: everyday its all the same the way you love to complicate, i knew that we never should've met
english.segment6: Yea money I'm asking you to leave nothing personal but you were never worth it all, oh please don't make this harder than it is.
english.segment7: Chorus: I'm changing the locks of my pockets now, cause if i don't let you in then you can't run out. Well i love to hate to love you, but i cant get enough of you, i can't get enough, so I've had enough of you.
english.segment8: End: Hey money just leave me alone!.
